Sentencas: Nano-structured composite electrodes, from a carefully conducted infiltration process, are one of the most promising electrode structures for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs), due to their ability to promote the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and enlarge triple phase boundaries (TPBs).
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we demonstrate rational design of infiltrated nano-structures for IT-SOFCs with enhanced ORR kinetics and excellent stability.
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We systematically designed a nano-structured cathode functional layer (CFL) from the infiltration of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3- (SSC) into porous Gd0.2Ce0.8O2- (GDC).
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By controlling the drying process during the infiltration process, two distinct nano-structures of SSC, discrete coating and film-like coating, were fabricated on the GDC scaffolds.
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The CFL with the film-like coating showed approximate to 30% reduction in polarization resistance (R-p) and approximate to 15% increase in peak power density at 650 degrees C compared to the CFL with the discrete coating in spite of approximate to 12-fold lower loading of infiltration materials.
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the CFL with the film-like coating showed an excellent stability, maintaining an R-p of 0.029 cm(2) for 100 h at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our results demonstrated that the high performance and stability of composite electrodes for IT-SOFCs can be achieved through a thin-film coated CFL.
Titulo: Nano-film coated cathode functional layers towards high performance solid oxide fuel cells
